message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $80. Let's start with an offer of $100. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
